name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Integration Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in seamless integration within healthcare systems. Proficient in **Mirth**, **HL7**, **XML**, **Python**, **JavaScript**, and database management using **MS-SQL**. Skilled in cloud-based solutions and data migration strategies, ensuring efficient data integration and API development utilizing **JSON**. Extensive experience in deploying integrations that enhance interoperability and data flow within healthcare applications.
Successfully developed high-performance applications in both healthcare and financial sectors, with deep knowledge of both frontend and backend technologies, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms focused on predictive analytics and real-time processing, along with a commitment to compliance-driven development adhering to HIPAA and other industry standards.
